description: Numbers n such that n^2 + n + 41 is composite.
comments: A subset of this sequence is shown in A055390. - _Matt C. Anderson_, Jan 05 2014
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
formula: a(n) ~ n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 25 2014
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..220] | not IsPrime(n^2 + n + 41)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 28 2012(PARI) is(n)=!isprime(n^2+n+41) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 25 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
